topic.title: Project overview tab

section.title: Setting up the project overview (dashboard reports)
section.p: The Overview tab is a project home page or dashboard. Your team can use this space for links, progress reporting, and other portal-type features. It is the first page users see when they log into a project.

bullets.title: Depending on how you setup the Overview tab, it can:
bullets.item: give you and your team a snapshot of project progress (with graphs, charts and tables in MQL)
provide links to important Mingle pages, such as pages describing team training, project scope, Mingle team usage, design guidelines
show pictures, screenshots and other graphics

topic.note: The Overview tab is a specialized page. Everything you can include on the Overview tab, you can also include on other pages. See Working with pages for details.
